name: Azure Blue Jaipuri Kurta
description: A vibrant Jaipuri print kurta in a refreshing azure blue. Made from pure cotton, perfect for casual outings and daily wear. Features a classic round neck and three-quarter sleeves.

name: Regal Maroon Silk Kurta Set
description: An elegant silk blend kurta set in a deep maroon. Comes with a churidar and is ideal for festive occasions and weddings. Embellished with fine gold thread work.

name: Classic White Chikankari Kurta
description: A timeless hand-embroidered Chikankari kurta in pristine white. Crafted from soft muslin cloth, it offers both comfort and elegance for any event.

name: Emerald Green Brocade Kurta
description: A luxurious brocade kurta in a stunning emerald green. The rich texture and royal sheen make it a perfect choice for grand celebrations.

name: Sunshine Yellow Bandhani Kurta
description: Brighten up your wardrobe with this cheerful Bandhani print kurta. The lightweight georgette fabric drapes beautifully, making it ideal for daytime events.

name: Midnight Black Mirror Work Kurta
description: A glamorous black kurta adorned with intricate mirror work. The contemporary design and flattering silhouette make it a showstopper for evening parties.

name: Pastel Pink Linen Kurta
description: A sophisticated and understated pastel pink kurta made from pure linen. Perfect for office wear or a semi-formal gathering, offering a blend of style and comfort.

name: Royal Blue Velvet Kurta
description: A plush velvet kurta in a striking royal blue. The soft texture and deep color exude luxury, making it suitable for winter weddings and formal events.

name: Earthy Brown Khadi Kurta
description: An eco-friendly and stylish Khadi kurta in an earthy brown tone. Simple, elegant, and breathable, it is an excellent choice for conscious fashion lovers.

name: Crimson Red Zari Work Kurta Set
description: A magnificent crimson red kurta set featuring heavy Zari embroidery. This ensemble is designed for brides and close family members for wedding ceremonies.

name: Lavender Angrakha Style Kurta
description: A trendy Angrakha style kurta in a lovely lavender shade. The cross-body tie-up and flared silhouette add a modern twist to a traditional design.

name: Mustard Yellow A-Line Kurta
description: A chic A-line kurta in a vibrant mustard yellow. The clean cut and solid color make it a versatile piece that can be styled in multiple ways.
